SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package utility

Class InputSelectionUtility

java.lang.Object
utility.InputSelectionUtility
public class InputSelectionUtility extends Object
The InputSelectionUtility class provides utility and helper methods for handling input of various forms. Helper functions include receiving inputs of integers, Strings and Dates. It also provides utility methods such as selecting a camp, getting enquiries and filter types.

    • getSelectedCamp

      public static Camp getSelectedCamp(List<Camp> camps)
      Selects a Camp from a list of Camps by getting user input.
      Parameters:
      camps - the list of available Camps
      Returns:
      the selected camp or null if no camp is selected

    • getYesNoInput

      public static boolean getYesNoInput(String prompt)
      Prompts the user with a message, asking user to confirm their choice with a boolean yes or no.
      Parameters:
      prompt - The message to display as a prompt.
      Returns:
      true if the user enters 'y' for yes, false if the user enters 'n' for no.

    • getSelectedBoolean

      public static boolean getSelectedBoolean(Camp selectedCamp)
      Obtains a boolean input for setting the visibility of a camp.
      Parameters:
      selectedCamp - The camp for which visibility is being set.
      Returns:
      true if the user selects 1 for "On," false if the user selects 0 for "Off," or prompts the user to enter again if an invalid choice is sent.

    • getUniqueCampName

      public static String getUniqueCampName(List<Camp> existingCamps)
      Gets a unique camp name from the user.
      Parameters:
      existingCamps - List of existing camps to check for name uniqueness
      Returns:
      the unique camp name

    • getCampInput

      public static CampInformation getCampInput(List<Camp> allCamps, Staff staff, SimpleDateFormat dateFormat)
      Collects input to create a CampInformation object.
      Parameters:
      allCamps - The list of all existing camps to ensure the uniqueness of the camp name.
      staff - The staff in charge for the camp.
      dateFormat - The date format to be used for parsing date inputs.
      Returns:
      A CampInformation object containing details of a new camp.

    • updateCampInput

      public static boolean updateCampInput(Camp camp, Staff staff, SimpleDateFormat dateFormat)
      Updates the details of the specified camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp object to update
      staff - the Staff making the update
      dateFormat - The date format to be used for parsing date inputs.
      Returns:
      true if the camp details were updated successfully, false otherwise

    • getSelectedEnquiry

      public static Enquiry getSelectedEnquiry(Map<Integer,Enquiry> enquiries)
      Gets the selected enquiry based on user input. User either enters a valid ID or return to exit enquiry input
      Parameters:
      enquiries - A map containing enquiries with their corresponding IDs.
      Returns:
      The selected Enquiry object, or null if the user chooses to return.

    • getSelectedSuggestion

      public static Suggestion getSelectedSuggestion(Map<Integer,Suggestion> suggestions)
      Gets the selected suggestion based on user input. User either enters a valid ID or return to exit Suggestion input
      Parameters:
      suggestions - A map containing suggestions with their corresponding IDs.
      Returns:
      The selected Suggestion object, or null if the user chooses to return.

    • getFilterInput

      public static List<String> getFilterInput()
      Gets the selected filters based on user input. Some filters include No filter, Camp Information, Attendee and Location.
      Returns:
      A list of selected filters, including the filter option.

    • getPerformanceFilterInput

      public static List<String> getPerformanceFilterInput()
      Gets the selected performance filters based on user input. Filters include No filter, Committee ID, Committee Name and Committee Points.
      Returns:
      A list of selected performance filters, including the filter option.

    • getEnquiryFilterInput

      public static List<String> getEnquiryFilterInput()
      Gets the selected enquiry filters based on user input. Filters include No filter, Enquiry ID, Sender ID, Responder ID and Enquiry Status.
      Returns:
      A list of selected enquiry filters, including the filter option.
